id.description: A string representing a UUID (universally unique identifier).

created_at.description: A number representing an automatic Unix timestamp in milliseconds.

updated_at.description: A number representing an automatic Unix timestamp in milliseconds.

upstream.description: The unique identifier or the name of the upstream for which to update the target.

target.description: The target address (ip or hostname) and port.

weight.description: The weight this target gets within the upstream loadbalancer (0-65535).

tags.description: A set of strings representing tags.
